title: Tweets Become Harder to Believe as Labels Change Meaning
description: The elimination of check marks that helped authenticate accounts has convulsed a platform that once seemed indispensable for following breaking news.

title: Meta Returns to Growth After Struggling With Falling Sales
description: The owner of Facebook and Instagram reported a 3 percent revenue increase in the latest quarter, even as spending rose and profits fell.

title: U.K. Blocks Microsoft’s Activision Bid, a Blow to the Tech Giant
description: The decision barring the $69 billion takeover of a big video game publisher is a major loss for Microsoft, which also faces pushback from U.S. regulators.

title: Binance Faces Mounting Pressure as U.S. Crypto Crackdown Intensifies
description: The scrutiny on Binance, the giant cryptocurrency exchange, has sent new tremors through a market that is still bruised by the implosion of FTX.
